name: Virtual Desktop
abstract: Connect wirelessly to your computer(s) to watch movies, browse the web, play 2D games or stream PCVR games

detail.app_release_note:
Welcome to Virtual Desktop! If you experience any issues, please visit the website at www.vrdesktop.net to check out the FAQ or reach out to us on Discord.

Changes in this version:
• Added encrypted traffic icon, render resolution percentage and max bitrate to Performance Overlay
• Added support for TeamBeef modded games to appear in the Games tab
• Added new music tracks
• Added ability to change the screenshots folder location (Media tab in Streamer window)
• Added option in Input tab to disable menu hold to switch out of VR
• Automatic codec will now choose HEVC 10-bit with Nvidia
• Improved support for Ultrawide monitors 
• Virtual monitor driver now supports up to 4k @ 120 (up from 2560x1440)
• Now preventing disconnection when videos are being downloaded
• Fixed GPU memory leak on the PC side
• Fixed slow decoding when using AMD 6450 and 6550 graphic cards
• Fixed Turkish keyboard layout
• Fixed game compatibility with: Tetris Effect, Premium Bowling, Battle Talent, Paradiddle
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4E, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
